oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Receipt for lace shawl purchased in Mobile, Alabama
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This is a receipt for the purchase of a lace shawl purchased by Mrs. DeBerry from Mrs. Blair Millinery & Dress Making, 36 Dauphin Street, Mobile, Alabama. Mrs. DeBerry was part of a wealthy planter family that lived in Madison County and Haywood County. This was a very expensive lace shawl and reflects the economic status of the DeBerry family.
